item.title: The importance of priorities in today's work environment
item.description:
As a mother, currently expecting my second child, this article truly resonated with me. I don’t often share personal thoughts online, but I believe this is a significant topic, especially for those of us in consulting. http://www.cnn.com/2012/04/16/opinion/stone-leave-work-day/index.html?hpt=hp_c1..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-importance-of-priorities-in-today-s-work-environment/
